verses.verse: ה֧וֹי <WH1945> Woe חֹֽשְׁבֵי־ <WH2803> to them that devise אָ֛וֶן <WH205> iniquity וּפֹ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> and work רָ֖ע <WH7451> evil עַל־ <WH5921> on מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָ֑ם <WH4904> upon their beds בְּא֤וֹר <WH216> is light הַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> when the morning יַעֲשׂ֔וּהָ <WH6213> they practise כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> it because it is לְאֵ֖ל <WH410> in the power יָדָֽם׃ <WH3027> of their hand

וְחָמְד֤וּ <WH2530> And they covet שָׂדוֹת֙ <WH7704> fields וְגָזָ֔לוּ <WH1497> and take [them] by violence וּבָתִּ֖ים <WH1004> and houses וְנָשָׂ֑אוּ <WH5375> and take [them] away וְעָֽשְׁקוּ֙ <WH6231> so they oppress גֶּ֣בֶר <WH1397> a man וּבֵית֔וֹ <WH1004> and his house וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> even a man וְנַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> and his heritage פ

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold חֹשֵׁ֛ב <WH2803> do I devise עַל־ <WH5921> against הַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֥ה <WH4940> Behold against this family הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> an evil אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot תָמִ֨ישׁוּ <WH4185> from which ye shall not remove מִשָּׁ֜ם <WH8033> in it צַוְּארֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6677> your necks וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> cannot תֵֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> walk רוֹמָ֔ה <WH7317> haughtily כִּ֛י <WH3588> for עֵ֥ת <WH6256> for this time רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> [is] evil הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> that

בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> they יִשָּׂ֧א <WH5375> shall [one] take up עֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5921> against מָשָׁ֗ל <WH4912> a parable וְנָהָ֨ה <WH5091> against you and lament נְהִ֤י <WH5092> lamentation נִֽהְיָה֙ <WH1961> become אָמַר֙ <WH559> [and] say שָׁד֣וֹד <WH7703> We be utterly נְשַׁדֻּ֔נוּ <WH7703> spoiled חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> the portion עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> of my people יָמִ֑יר <WH4171> he hath changed אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> How יָמִ֣ישׁ <WH4185> how hath he removed לִ֔י לְשׁוֹבֵ֥ב <WH7728> to the apostate שָׂדֵ֖ינוּ <WH7704> our fields יְחַלֵּֽק׃ <WH2505> he hath divided

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> Therefore לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will have לְךָ֔ מַשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast חֶ֖בֶל <WH2256> a cord בְּגוֹרָ֑ל <WH1486> by lot בִּקְהַ֖ל <WH6951> in the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

אַל־ <WH408> not תַּטִּ֖פוּ <WH5197> Prophesy יַטִּיפ֑וּן <WH5197> ye not [say they to them that] prophesy לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יַטִּ֣פוּ <WH5197> they shall not prophesy לָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יִסַּ֖ג <WH5253> to them [that] they shall not take כְּלִמּֽוֹת׃ <WH3639> shame

הֶאָמ֣וּר <WH559> O [thou that art] named בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> the house יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> of Jacob הֲקָצַר֙ <WH7114> straitened ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> is the spirit יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אִם־ <WH518> lo אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> another מַעֲלָלָ֑יו <WH4611> doing הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not דְבָרַ֨י <WH1697> act יֵיטִ֔יבוּ <WH3190> do good עִ֖ם <WH5973> with הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> convenient הוֹלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> to him that walketh

וְאֶתְמ֗וּל <WH865> Even of late עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> my people לְאוֹיֵ֣ב <WH341> as an enemy יְקוֹמֵ֔ם <WH6965> is risen up מִמּ֣וּל <WH4136> with שַׂלְמָ֔ה <WH8008> the garment אֶ֖דֶר <WH145> the robe תַּפְשִׁט֑וּן <WH6584> ye pull off מֵעֹבְרִ֣ים <WH5674> from them that pass בֶּ֔טַח <WH983> by securely שׁוּבֵ֖י <WH7725> as men averse מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> from war

נְשֵׁ֤י <WH802> The women עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> of my people תְּגָ֣רְשׁ֔וּן <WH1644> have ye cast out מִבֵּ֖ית <WH1004> houses תַּֽעֲנֻגֶ֑יהָ <WH8588> from their pleasant מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> From עֹֽלָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5768> from their children תִּקְח֥וּ <WH3947> have ye taken away הֲדָרִ֖י <WH1926> my glory לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

ק֣וּמוּ <WH6965> Arise וּלְכ֔וּ <WH1980> and go כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> is no זֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise הַמְּנוּחָ֑ה <WH4496> for this [is] not [your] rest בַּעֲב֥וּר <WH5668> Because טָמְאָ֛ה <WH2930> because it is polluted תְּחַבֵּ֖ל <WH2254> it shall destroy וְחֶ֥בֶל <WH2256> destruction נִמְרָֽץ׃ <WH4834> [you] even with a sore

לוּ־ <WH3863> If אִ֞ישׁ <WH376> a man הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> walking ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> in the spirit וָשֶׁ֣קֶר <WH8267> and falsehood כִּזֵּ֔ב <WH3576> do lie אַטִּ֣ף <WH5197> [saying] I will prophesy לְךָ֔ לַיַּ֖יִן <WH3196> unto thee of wine וְלַשֵּׁכָ֑ר <WH7941> and of strong drink וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become מַטִּ֖יף <WH5197> he shall even be the prophet הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

אָסֹ֨ף <WH622> I will surely אֶאֱסֹ֜ף <WH622> assemble יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> O Jacob כֻּלָּ֗ךְ <WH3605> all קַבֵּ֤ץ <WH6908> all of thee I will surely אֲקַבֵּץ֙ <WH6908> gather שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel יַ֥חַד <WH3162> them together אֲשִׂימֶ֖נּוּ <WH7760> I will put כְּצֹ֣אן <WH6629> as the sheep בָּצְרָ֑ה <WH1223> the fold כְּעֵ֙דֶר֙ <WH5739> as the flock בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַדָּֽבְר֔וֹ <WH1699> of their fold תְּהִימֶ֖נָה <WH1949> they shall make great noise מֵאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> by reason of [the multitude of] men

עָלָ֤ה <WH5927> is come up הַפֹּרֵץ֙ <WH6555> The breaker לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> before פָּֽרְצוּ֙ <WH6555> them they have broken up וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֔רוּ <WH5674> and have passed through שַׁ֖עַר <WH8179> the gate וַיֵּ֣צְאוּ <WH3318> and are gone out ב֑וֹ וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ר <WH5674> shall pass מַלְכָּם֙ <WH4428> by it and their king לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> before וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> them and the LORD בְּרֹאשָֽׁם׃ <WH7218> on the head פ
